attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: access to the children of non-resident parents,make this part of the payment agreement,its not right for the non resident to have to pay to up keep the children then have to find more money to take the resident parent to court to get access to his/her own flesh and blood. Its an unfair sytem, this goverment goes on about the good of the children and families NEED FATHERS yet we have to pay three time, 1 setting up home in the first place,2 leavingn the home for the good of the children,3 seeking court order after court order to see the children,WHY!!!!!! as with mother rights they get access reguardless yet fathers have to go through the courts to get there access. unfair and one sidded,IF the children are at risk form the fathers then yes they should seek court permission, otherwise fathers should be givin access as a matter of right, maybe then more dads will pay up.
